PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-07112012-05-31,  ,  ,  ,  TC
ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisApproval of the re-appointment by the Minister of Transport of MARCEL BEAUBIEN of Petrolia, Ontario, as a director of the board of directors of the Blue Water Bridge Authority to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year, effective June 23, 2014; and appointment of MARCEL BEAUBIEN of Petrolia, Ontario, as chairperson of the board of directors of the Blue Water Bridge Authority to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective June 23, 2012.
AttachmentsAttachment
